TextView.android:text: Welcome to Smart Cat Door Application. Here are some basic Guidlines for how the mobile app works. The live button from the home page Will take you to a live video feed where you can get live updates from the camera. You have the choice to press a button that can manually open the door just in case the cat was not authenticated by the algorithm. The upload button should take you to a page where the face features of the cat will be recorded for the first time. The door button is responsible for allowing you to manually open the door.

The Setting portion is responsible for seeing the settings of the application. The guide section is a guide of how the application works which you are currently on. The team button takes you to a page that displays the name of the team that brought you Smart Cat Doors. Enjoy!
